name: Warlock Bentspine - Neanderthal Edition
description:
A trash platformer that rips off megaman among other things. Made by putting in zero effort which is why it sounds and looks the way it does. Not worth your time or salt. Comes with the editable so people can marvel at what a travesty it is on the inside as well as on the outside.

Check the readme if you want to be a honorable gamer.
